attributes.action: Invoke Article 49 of the TEU: (re)Joining the European Union
attributes.background:
Article 49 of the Treaty of the European Union states:
"Any European State which respects freedom, democracy and human rights of minorities may apply to become a member of the Union."

If the UK leaves the EU, we should begin the process of rejoining immediately.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK can't apply to be a member of an organisation it is already a member of.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253267
